item.title: Guthans
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

hey, i was just wondering if anyone knew how to make guthans fully functional … like say for instance i was fighting i would want guthans to heal what i hit or something along those lines… heres what i tried

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(2) == 1) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } }
it compiled without any errors but didnt work … also i have the boolean FullGuthanEquipped and it still doesnt work … could someone please help it would be greatly appreciated

Read full topic
